snippet.title: In Conversation with Jasper Youngbear and Pharrell Williams
snippet.description: In June Pharrell traveled to North Dakota to shoot the adidas Originals Hu Collection with the Native American people of the M.H.A. Nation. Here, Jasper Youngbear sits down with Pharrell to talk about his tribespeople, their spirituality, inspiration, expression, and purpose.

snippet.title: Pharrell Williams Masterclass with Students at NYU Clive Davis Institute
snippet.description:
Pharrell Williams hosts a masterclass for music students at The Clive Davis Institute of Recorded Music at NYU's Tisch School of the Arts as part of his 50TH ANNIVERSARY Artist-In-Residency. Joined by Dean Allyson Dean and Professors Bob Power and Jason King, Pharrell listens to students’ projects, offers constructive criticism, and discusses the nature of the creative process.  Pharrell also invited high school kids from the Future Music Moguls, a free high school program at Clive Davis Institute, to observe the masterclass.

Cafuné "Don't You Forget" https://soundcloud.com/wearecafune/dyf

Follow:
http://twitter.com/clivedavisinst
http://twitter.com/futuremusicmgls

For more info :
http://tisch.nyu.edu/clive-davis-institute
http://tisch.nyu.edu/programs-departments/future-artist/programs/future-music-moguls

snippet.title: WatchTheDuck’s Inside the Trojan Horse - "i am OTHER" Ep. 1
snippet.description:
Red-hot hip-hop/electronic duo WatchTheDuck launches their “Inside The Trojan Horse” series. Offering exclusive insights into the collective’s origins and meteoric rise to fame, Episode One: i am OTHER features a roundtable discussion with Pharrell Williams, who calls WTD’s sound “pure and untainted."

WatchTheDuck 'The Trojan Horse' EP is OUT NOW!

snippet.title: Pharrell Williams - HAPPY Book Press Conference
snippet.description:
Pharrell Williams was caught off-guard at his own press conference earlier this week when a group of local children surprised him by taking on the task of questioning him on his new book, 'Happy!'. The London based kids grilled him about his favorite book, where he likes to read, and if he orders a Happy Meal at McDonalds.

Purchase HAPPY by Pharrell Williams: http://po.st/happybook

Penguin Random House Children’s will publish the first book, HAPPY! - a picture book featuring photographs of children across cultures celebrating what it means to be happy, inspired by the words of this best-loved song - under the Puffin imprint simultaneously with the US publisher, Putnam, an imprint of Penguin Young Readers on October 6th, 2015.

In 2014, Pharrell Williams’ Oscar-nominated song “Happy!” became the UK’s most downloaded track. It has 630 million views on YouTube and has sold 12 million copies worldwide, becoming one of the world’s bestselling singles.

Pharrell recently spoke to the UN about the birthright that is happiness on the International Day of Happiness, and won best International Male Solo Artist at the Brit Awards.

snippet.title: Pharrell Visits Takashi Murakami - The 500 Arhats
snippet.description: Takashi Murakami unveils his first exhibition in Japan in 14 years, "The 500 Arhats", at the Mori Art Museum in Tokyo. October 31st 2015 - March 6th 2016.

snippet.title: Pharrell Williams Introduces His Children's Book, HAPPY!
snippet.description:
Grammy Award winner Pharrell Williams's super-hit song "Happy" is now a picture book!

Nominated for an Academy Award in 2014, "Happy" hit number one on Billboard's Hot 100 list, and has topped the charts in more than seventy-five countries worldwide. Now Pharrell Williams brings his beloved song to the youngest of readers in photographs of children across cultures celebrating what it means to be happy. All the exuberance of the song pulses from these vibrant photographs of excited, happy kids. This is a picture book full of memorable, precious childhood moments that will move readers in the same way they were moved by the song. Take a peek inside the book at ReadHappyBook.com.

snippet.title: Pharrell Williams Performs FREEDOM on The Tonight Show with Jimmy Fallon
snippet.description:
Pharrell Williams performs "Freedom" atop the brand new Tonight Show marquee outside 30 Rockefeller Center on September 11th, 2015. Watch the full performance at: https://youtu.be/osTaC1AhOXk

Download "FREEDOM" on iTunes: smarturl.it/PWfreedom

snippet.title: #TeamFNV Public Service Announcement created by FOHTA Students
snippet.description:
An ad made FOR kids. An ad made BY Kids.  During the Summer of Innovation Camp put on by  From One Hand To anOTHER, founded by Pharrell Williams, kids were encouraged to make an ad for the brand "FNV" in order to make eating fruits and vegetables more appealing to their friends. They came up with the idea and shot the commercial themselves in less than three weeks. Move over advertising executives, we've got some creative geniuses in the making.

In order to get kids to eat more fruits and veggies, we needed to make fruits and veggies cool. So, we decided to use the same marketing tactics big popular brands use. Enter FNV, the brand made up of every fruit and vegetable in the world. And since we want kids to eat more fruits and veggies, who better to tell us what they want to see in ads than kids themselves? So, we enlisted the help of kids attending the Summer of Innovation Camp to see what they wanted to see in ads and created a campaign with their input.

snippet.title: Making of #TeamFNV PSA created by FOHTA Students
snippet.description: Go behind the scenes with FOHTA students as they make a PSA for FNV - the newest brand in town. In order to get kids to eat more fruits and veggies, we needed to make fruits and veggies cool. So, we decided to use the same marketing tactics big popular brands use. Enter FNV, the brand made up of every fruit and vegetable in the world. And since we want kids to eat more fruits and veggies, who better to tell us what they want to see in ads than kids themselves? So, we enlisted the help of kids attending the Summer of Innovation Camp put on by From One Hand to AnOTHER, founded by Pharrell Williams, to see what they wanted to see in ads and created a campaign with their input.

snippet.title: The Cast of DOPE Goes Wild at Cannes
snippet.description:
Jada Yuan of New York Magazine hosts the DOPE panel at the 2015 Cannes Film Festival. Watch the hilarious Q&A with Director Rick Famuyiwa, Zoe Kravitz, Kiersey Clemons, Shameik Moore, Quincy Jones, A$AP Rocky, and Tony Revolori.

A critical hit and audience favorite out of the Sundance Film Festival, in DOPE, Malcolm (Shameik Moore) is carefully surviving life in a tough neighborhood in Los Angeles while juggling college applications, academic interviews, and the SAT. A chance invitation to an underground party leads him into an adventure that could allow him to go from being a geek, to being dope, to ultimately being himself.

NOW PLAYING IN THEATERS EVERYWHERE: http://dopemovietickets.com

Watch the official movie trailer:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XUBpnslcHVA

snippet.title: Pharrell Williams - International Day of Happiness
snippet.description:
Pharrell Williams celebrates the 2015 International Day of Happiness with a visit to Google for a Q&A with Lynn Hirschberg, a lighting ceremony at the Empire State Building, and a trip to the United Nations to speak to students with climate experts Sylvia Earle and Philippe Cousteau to discuss creating a happy planet through Climate Action. The International Day of Happiness is celebrated each year on March 20th, in partnership with the UN Foundation for a healthy, happy planet. 

- Sign the Live Earth petition to tell world leaders to take Climate Action at liveearth.org
- Learn more about the UN Foundation at unfoundation.org

Directed & edited by Katie Davison
Footage generously contributed by Lyn Lear and Louie Schwartzberg.

snippet.title: Meet the Baes: Brya
snippet.description:
Meet Brya Underwood, one of Pharrell Williams's dancers. She's from Atlanta and is known for her Southern hip hop style of dance. "Meet the Baes" is a series that gives you an introduction to the dancers and singers who perform alongside Pharrell on stage. Baes wardrobe provided by adidas Originals: adidas.com/originals
